meanings.definition: The uppermost part of the body in humans, joined to the trunk by the neck.
meanings.sent1: She gently touched her heid to feel if she had a fever.
meanings.sent2: The heid holds the eyes, nose, and mouth.
meanings.sent3: The heid nodded in agreement with a smile.
meanings.sent4: His heid was filled with ideas, like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The heid can turn from side to side to look around.

meanings.definition: A person's head regarded as the location of the mind and thought.
meanings.sent1: Using her heid, she solved the puzzle quickly.
meanings.sent2: He used his heid to come up with a clever plan.
meanings.sent3: The heid seemed to be full of bright ideas today.
meanings.sent4: Her heid was a library of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The heid can imagine wonderful stories and adventures.

meanings.definition: The front, top, or upper part of something.
meanings.sent1: The heid of the mountain was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: The heid of the tree reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The heid of the cake was decorated with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: The heid of the building gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The heid of the bookshelf held her favorite books.

meanings.definition: The person in charge of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: As the heid of the team, he made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The heid of the company led with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The heid of the club organized a fun event for everyone.
meanings.sent4: She was the heid of the family, always looking out for others.
meanings.sent5: The heid of the school guided the students towards success.

meanings.definition: A rounded mass of foam or froth on a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The heid of the beer was thick and creamy.
meanings.sent2: She scooped off the heid of the soup before serving.
meanings.sent3: The heid of the hot chocolate was sprinkled with cinnamon.
meanings.sent4: The heid of the latte art was a delicate heart shape.
meanings.sent5: The heid of the cappuccino was like a fluffy cloud on top.
